transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sollunga madam.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: A unga sollunga.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Sollunga. Sollunga sir.
Customer: Sir India Mart [inaudible] sir.
Executive: Sollunga sir.
Customer: Yes sir sir nama andha concern open pannirunom. Adhu appadiye thaan irukkunga. So adhu ennainguradhu nama aduthaduthu. Adhukku request koduthirundhene sir. Naan ellame sollirundhene aduthaduthu pesurukku naan oru 30 minutes before discussionla sollirukkene adhukku ungalukku irukkumla details ellame irukkum.
Executive: Kandippa irukkunga sir. Illa ippo naan enna kekkuren appadinnna ippo idhukku aduthu idhu enna solutionnguradhu paakuradhu thaan correctaa irukkum illaiyaa. Ippo neenga ivlo periya like oru naan kettadhukku neenga thaan sir solution kodukkanum. Aama sir.
Executive: Yes I am ready to give the solution sir. Ippo ungalukku indha business convert aagalainguradhu thaan idhu problemnguringa illaiyaa. Ippo enakku enna naan idhula enna nadandhurukkunguradhu review pannaa thaan nammalaala properaana oru solution. Sir neraiya time pesiyaachu sir. En time neenga thiruppiyum waste pandreenga nu ninaikkiren sir. Ungalukku ella detail irukkumbodhu yen sir adhukku solution sollaame sir neenga. Yen sir thiruppi en kitta question pandreenga.
Executive: Sir questioninguradhu illainga sir. So naanga enquiry kodukkrom enquiry attend pandreenga evlo numbersnguradhu thaan engalaala paakka mudiyum. But internally enna nadandhurukkunguradhu ungalukku mattum thaan theriyum. Ippo ange enna nadandhurukkunguradhu naan unga kitta kekkama eppadi sir naan therinjukka mudiyum. Adhanaala thaan naan call pandren. So enakku enna naan ippo neenga by leadsme seri and direct enquiriesme seri rendu properaana consumptionla correctaana attendingla poittu irukku. So irundhume ungalukku indha responseo illa business closingo nadakkala appadinnna appa adhu endha idathula working gap nadandhurukkunguradhu therinjaa thaan sir adhukku etta solution. Sir naan oru nimisham. Adhukku naan solution adhukku situatione naan sollitten naan enna sonnenaa.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Enakku ennoda cataloggum ennoda profileaiyum re-align pannannum. Pictures mapping grouping pictures addition work adding work image profile andha score andha product patti score solreengala adhu idhu ellame indha vishayam ellame ungalttayum neenga thaan pesureenga nu ninaikkiren oru two years before sorry oru one week before adhukappuram oru madam pesunaanga. Avanga pesunadhula avanga enna kettanganna appuram yen neenga use pandreenga appinnaanga. Naan appa vitturen madam cancel pannidalaam vitturunga appinna avangalttayum sollitten. Yenna oru oruthavangalttayum naan ukaandhu explain pannitte irukka mudiyaadhu ennoda business adhu kidaiyaadhu. Solla vandha illa illa neenga ippo naan enna naan solren oru nimisham ungalttayum adhu earkkanave sonnen sir neenga thiruppiyum adhu repeat pannumbodhu thaan enakku innum kovam varudhu. Summaa aracha maave araikkira maari thiruppi thiruppi neenga adhe pesittu irukkenga adhukku solution sollitten. Adhaavadhu enakku enna thevainguradhaiyum naan thelivaa ungalukku kettuten. Idhunaala thaan neenga R&D panni research pandreenga rendu varusham naan kaasa katti naan research pannirukken adha patti. Edhunaala adhu conversion aaga maattengudhu. Ennoda product clearra illa product patti ennoda product ennoda productla catalogla ennoda profilela correctaa adhula add aagala images ellame oru blank imagesaa irukkudhu idhu ellame proper pannannumnaa en kitta design oru team vandhu correctaa adha access panni naan solra maari adhaavadhu naan phone linele ukaandhunde vela paakka mudiyaadhu. Appadithaan neenga kodukka mudiyungareenga appadithaan enakku thevai illainu India Mart idhu thaan vishayam. Neenga thiruppi thiruppi neenga pesunadhe unga termskaandi oru customer hold pannannungaradhukkaandi neenga pesunadhe pesittu irukkeenga. Naan ennoda vishayathula ennoda vishayathula naan clearraa irukken. Enakku oruthavanga vandhu oruthavanga vandhu enakku offlinela ennoda service ennoda storeukku eppadi order edukkumbodhu oruthavanga team vandhu order edukkiradhukku mattum ungalukku directaa store visit possibilities irukkumbodhu yen oru customerukku service kodukkumbodhu direct visit ungalala possibilities illa. Appannaa adhu venaam appinna sonnen idhu thaan rendu rendu point thaan enna concern illainna adhukku enna solution sollunga adha poiralaam. Sir sir sir sir sir sir romba neram venaam sir naan sonnadhu clear aayiduchu adhukku neenga reply kodukka mudinnaa kodunga adhukku mela venaam. I am ready to give sir I am ready to give reply enna naan ippo idhu products change pannaa ungalukku andha vishayangal ellame clear irukkiradhu thaan solreenga illaiyaa. So we are ready to give the andha proper servicing sir. Ippo almost totalaa 158 adhaavadhu 158 products add aayirukku adhula 58 products inactivela irukku. So 100 products pakkam vandhu paatheenganna activela irukku but adhu edhume vandhu efficientaa illa and effectiveaa illannu solirukkeenga illaiyaa. So we just do one catalog naan 100 koduthurukradhula ungaloda by leadla naan ethana sir ungalukku adhu visible thiruppi repeatedaa varudhu sollunga. Naan 100 koduthurukken naan lead purchase pannirukken paatheengala lead buy pannirukkenla adhula ethana lead andha 100la maximum four to three numbers thaan lead receive aagum. Repeatedaa. Appadi ungalukku 20 kooda vachukkunga 100 product vachurukkumbodhu 20 productnaa inga varumnaa appa endha sidela mistake irukku sir. Sir illa idhu idhu oru wrongaana idhu sir ennaala idhukku andha dataave thara mudiyum endhendha productkku data I mean by leads visibleaa irukku endhendha idhukku receive aagalanguradhu enakku adhu proper dataave naan tharen vaara sollunga ippo naan phone linelaam pesittu naan ukaandhu pesuradhavida neraa ukaandhu pesalaamla thelivaa irukkumla enakku time irukkala enakku business ippo ungalukku oru business hours irukkura maari enakku oru business hours irukku naan andha nerathula ungalukku explain ungalai thiruthuradhu ennoda vela kidaiyaadhu. Adhaavadhu ungaloda software ungalukkulla troubles neenga research pandradhukku ennai oru karuviya neenga use pandreenga en clientaa ennai time waste pandreenga. Ippo irupeengainguradhu naan expect pannala sir like indha alavukku ungalukku vandhu idhukku munnadi pesunavanga vandhu romba pottu idhu pannirukkaanga arch pannirukkaanga neengalume appadithaan pandreenga enakku neengalume enakku appadithaan pandreenga naan clearraa ennoda vishayatha sollitten conversation pochuunga illa idhukku munnadi nama rendu per conversation pochu but neenga indha products changing patti oru solutione solla neenga en kitta lastaa sonnadhu enna naan we are having a recording sir neenga enna sonneenga enakku clearraa nyaabagam irukku sir adhai kettuttu adhai kettuttu adhukku solution enna naan enakku list by listaa eduthuttu enakku sollunga sir naan rendae rendu point thaan ketten pesittu irukkeenga sir oru nimisham sir rendae rendu point thaan naan ketten neenga thiruppiyum enakku solution naan phonela koduppen mapping pannunga grouping record irukku la adhu note pannikkunga naan thelivaa pesurenu enakku nalla enakku irukku yenna business pandren naan thelivaa naan ella clarityume naan neenga record pannikkura maari enakku register memoriesla register aayirukkum yenna ore vishayathula naan repeat pannittu irukken India Mart kitta enakku ennoda on sitela ennoda adhaavadhu offlinela vandhu enakku ennoda queries rectifiy panni koduthaa mattum thaan idhula solution kidaikkunguradhu naan 100% naan mudivu pannitten. Neenga thiruppi naan phone linela varren naan zoomla varren naan zoomla varren enakku naan indha product patti enakku explain pannunga sir rendu nimisham kodukka mudiyum ennai paathu indha product patti ungalukku ippadi pannunga sir appadi pannunga sir illa sir indha picture first vainga indha picture second vainga naan 100 picturekkum ukaandhu naan ukaandhu ungalukku explain pannittu irukkum paaru appa naan enna pannannaa rendu maasam ungalukku ukaandhu vela paakkanum earkkanave rendu varusham enakku waste aayiduchu. Rendu varusham indha India Martoda teamla design teamla yaarume properaa illa adhanaala yaarume proper guidance kodukkadhu adhanaala anju nimisham ungaloda maasa accountkaandi enakku callla pesi neenga andha calla close pannittu andha customerta pesittom mudinjiruchu appadinnu neenga poranaala endha account managerume enakku solution kodukka mudila endha appointment neengalume even though adhanaala thaan venaannu close pannitten sir rendae rendu point sir ennai thiruppi ippo 10 nimisham ennai pesa vachitteenga idhukkume enakku kovam varudhu naan sonnadhu puriyaadhadha maari chinna pulla maari neenga thiruppi thiruppi pesittu irukkuradhu oru businessla irukkeenga neenga oru telecallerraa irukkeenga illa oru senioraa kooda irukkalaam neenga oru managerraa kooda irukkalaam thiruppi naan sonnadha idhu pannama neenga solution kodukkira sollittu thiruppi andha point thaan neenga vareenga vera enna solution koduthura poreenga sollunga naan kettadhu kodukka mudiyumaa ungalala mudiyaadhu adhanaala thaan naan solren adhu appinnaa enakku theva kidaiyaadhu enakku ungaltta andha norms illainna enakku andha norms illa naan phonela ukaandhu ungalukku pesa mudiyaadhu ennaala. Sorry naan sollunga sir illa idhu naan ungala retain pandradhukkaaga solla kidaiyaadhunga sir actually idhu effectiveaa work aagudhu like idhula ungalukku results illanguradhunaala neenga indha alavukku neenga fed up aaguradhu naan thappu sollainga sir ungalukku indha products appadi sir result varaadhukku reason idhu thaan sir sir result varaadhukku idhu thaan reason ennaala phone linela rendu varushamaa panna mudiyaadhu ippo ennaala panna mudiyaadhu sir aama sir rendu varushamaa naan panna mudiyaadhu ippo ennaala panna mudiyaadhu sir India Mart norms illainna vitturunga sir ennai venaam sir illa sir idhu maari eththanaiyo customer ungalukku loss aagattum sir vidunga sir theriyum naan solla varen naalaikku ungalukku theriyadhu naan solla varalainga naanga enna pandromnguradha mattum naan solren ippo ungalukku idhula products update aaganum adhu neenga nerla vandhaa thaan pannuvennu solreenga illaiyaa naan nerla illaamaye adhavida effectiveaavum efficientaavum pannalai pannalai ennaala ungalukku support panna mudiyaadhu sir andha maari vishayam irukkuradhunaala avlodhaan sir vishayam naan agree pandradhu yenna naan enakku vandhu enakku arivu illa sir enakku arivu illa sir enakku technical knowledge kidaiyaadhu sir enakku computerla ungalukku phonela solli unga mandaikku puriya vaikkira maariyo unga teamukku naan puriya vaikkira maariyo yenna ellaarume oru co worker thaan sir neenga oru vishayathula neenga ukaandhu follow pandreengannaa ungalala oru limit thaan panna mudiyum indha customer naalu vishayam innum maathi maathi pannunga nu sonnaangannaa panna maattaanga enakku andha pann ungalukku solli ungalukku puriya vachi pandra alavukku enakku time illa order edukkumbodhu eppadi process pannumbodhu neraa vandhu pannangalo oru team vachi pannangalo adhu maari pannunga illatti en ennaala yaachu indha vishayam nadakkattum ennai maari eththanaiyo customer ungalukku kaasa katti ssummaa pottu vachirukkaanga. Saringalaa andha maari aagaama irukkattum appinguradhukkaandi naan oru resolution edukkiren vera edhume kidaiyaadhu indha pointla idhu thaan clearraa naan solradhu idhukku solution irundhaa vaanga sir illainnaa dhayavu seidhu vitturunga sir adhukku enna solution sollunga sir pesuradhu melum melum ennai pesi ennai innum fed up aaga vaikkaadhinga enakku innum tension aagudhu please dhayavu seidhu vitturunga disconnect pandreengalaa calla enna naan pannavaa yen time waste aagudhu sir nimisham pesi solution enna solution pesureenga ethana nimisham waste aayiruchu enakku ettu manikku office closing neraiya velaigal irukku naan enna solution neenga thiruppiyum adhe solutiona solreenga appinguradhukku thaan enakku puriyudhu neenga enna solla poreenga sir konjam illa enakku illa neenga ivlo tension aaga venaam sir enakku puriyudhu neenga vandhu ivlo fed up aayitteenga fed up aayitteenga sir neenga thiruppiyum neenga enna solla vareenga nu paarungalen. First solla vittaa thaan sir theriyum naan enna solla varenguradhu naan actually ungalukku neenga kekkura maariyaana optionsnguradhu idhula illa openaa naan sollirren but neenga kekkura andha results ennaala thara mudiyum irundha idathula irundhe naan adha tharadhukku ready neenga tharrennu solli promise pannavanga yaarume tharala two years neenga illa neenga two years India Mart already vandhu witness pannitteenga sir enakku just oru two weeks kodunga neenga two years paathurukkeenga enakku oru two weeks kodungannaa naan kekkuren ippo in case ungalukku indha problem sorted out aagala appadinnna ungalukku oru feedback mail varum innikku saringalaa andha feedback mailla not satisfiednguradhu kodunga indha ticket again raise aagum adhe same datoda adhe same datoda saringalaa so naan ippo enna pandren appadinnna ungalukku idhu endha alavukku effectiveaa eduthuttu porenguradha naan oru whatsapp group create pandren andha whatsapp groupla neenga naanu account manager iruppaanga and ungaludaiya employee yaarum irukkaanga appadinnna avangalayume kodunga so idhula enna enna products remove pannumo naan total productsme kooda remove panna solren enna enna products idhu pannannunguradha neenga engerunga neenga pesunadhe pesureenga naanum pesunadhe pesuven inga paarunga oru nimisham sir neenga pesunadhe pesuveenga naanum pesunadhe pesuven neenga vandhu neenga vandhu neenga illa neenga idhu thaan ellaarume solraanga adhu enakku workout aagala neenga indha maari method enakku pandradhu workout aagala adhanaala ennaala satisfied panna mudiyaala ok sir sir oru nimisham irunga naan solradha gavaninga neenga naan solradha gavaninga oru nimisham earkkanave oru group enna add pannittaanga maaladhi naadaarnu oruthavanga irundhaanga oru account manager nu avanga oru group add pannanga idhe maari thaan service pandrennaanga sonnaanga pannanga adhu ella engannaala po thelivu line adhaavadhu onlinela engalaala dataava thaan receive panni pesa mudiyume thavira ungalukku naan ennoda idhu vishayatha ennoda vishayatha ungalukku naan explain panna mudiyaadhu ennoda producta patti explain panna mudiyaadhu indha picture maathunga andha picture maathungannu solla mudiyaadhu neenga vandhaalume ippo enna support kidaikkudho adhe thaan sir ungalukku kidaikka pogudhu appingumbodhu appadingumbodhu indha 100 producta vandhu rendu naalula mudichiralaam naan phonela pannennnaa enakku rendu maasam aagum adhu maari ippo idhu pora maari rendu varusham kooda aagi poirum rendu varusham kooda idhu aagum idhu aaguradhukku okingalaa enna solraanga illa ippo nerla varadhunaala ungalukku ore naalula 100 productslaam add panna mudiyaadhunga to be honest openaa thaan unmai like nerla varadhunaala 100 products ore naalulaam add panna mudiyaadhu adhukkume oru time edukkum naan enna solrennaa daily basisla naan ungalukku anjula pathu products add pandradhukkaana support naan panna solren 10 daysla 100 products add panna mudiyumaa naan adhu naan adhu catalog workingkaanadhu ellame naan poruppu eduthukkirenu naan solren sir ungalukku eppadi norms sollu enakku vandhu ungaltta phone linela naan spend pandradhukku enakku time illa sir okingalaa naan ungalukku vandhu naan vandhu train panna mudiyaadhu sir ungalukku ennoda product knowledge ungalukku kodukka mudiyaadhu enakku phone linele pesikitte irukka mudiyaadhu sir enakku idhuve enakku serious head aches vandhuruchu enakku enakku ungaltta pesi ippo enakku head aches vandhuruchu sir please enakku seriousaa solren enakku indha vishayathunaala thaan innum vandhu enakku suffer aagudhu innum enakku adhiga maana oru seriousaa enakku innum idhunaaleye naan venaannu thaan ninaikkiren seri appa edhukku idha siramappattu indha India Martta thongittu irukkanum vera platform illa illa sir neenga konjam appa yosikkiren sir seriousaa solren appadithaan naan solren yenna businessse edukkaama businessse edukkaama idhu businessum idhula ivlo suffer aagi ennoda catalog naan kaasu kattunadhukke enakku ivlodhaan limitedaa naan service tharuven appadinnu neenga sollumbodhu adhu edhukku appadinnu yosikka sir vera edhula please sorry ok sir vachittumla thank you sir thank you sir ok sir ennoda optionukku neenga vaanga sir ungaloda optionukku ennaala vara mudiyaadhu sir ungaloda optionukku sir ungaloda optionukku ennaala vara mudiyaadhu sir avlodhaan sir vishayam adhukku enna step sollanum adhaan sir sonnen neenga neenga group add pandreenga konjam konjam theriya varum sir illa first enakku naan enna solren illaiyaa
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants re-alignment of catalog and profile.

- Wants pictures, mapping, grouping, addition work.

- Wants offline service for rectifying queries.

- Expresses frustration with repetitive questioning.



Resolution:

- Executive offered proper servicing.

- Executive offered WhatsApp group for communication.

- Executive asked for two weeks to sort out problems.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.

- If not satisfied, ticket will be raised again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, profile, offline service, re-alignment
